017package org.microbean.type;
018
019import java.lang.reflect.GenericArrayType;
020import java.lang.reflect.ParameterizedType;
021import java.lang.reflect.Type;
022
023import java.util.Objects;
024
025/**
026 * A {@link GenericArrayType} implementation.
027 *
028 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
029 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
030 *
031 * @see GenericArrayType
032 */
033public final class DefaultGenericArrayType implements GenericArrayType {
034
035  private final Type genericComponentType;
036
037  private final int hashCode;
038
039  /**
040   * Creates a new {@link DefaultGenericArrayType}.
041   *
042   * @param genericComponentType the generic component type; must not
043   * be {@code null}; should almost certainly be a {@link
044   * ParameterizedType}
045   */
046  public DefaultGenericArrayType(final Type genericComponentType) {
047    super();
048    this.genericComponentType = Objects.requireNonNull(genericComponentType);
049    this.hashCode = genericComponentType.hashCode();
050  }
051
052  DefaultGenericArrayType(final Class<?> rawType, final Type... actualTypeArguments) {
053    this(new DefaultParameterizedType(rawType == null ? null : rawType.getDeclaringClass(),
054                                      rawType,
055                                      actualTypeArguments));
056  }
057
058  @Override
059  public final Type getGenericComponentType() {
060    return this.genericComponentType;
061  }
062
063  @Override
064  public final int hashCode() {
065    return this.hashCode;
066  }
067
068  @Override
069  public final boolean equals(final Object other) {
070    if (other == this) {
071      return true;
072    } else if (other instanceof GenericArrayType) {
073      final GenericArrayType her = (GenericArrayType)other;
074      return this.getGenericComponentType().equals(her.getGenericComponentType());
075    } else {
076      return false;
077    }
078  }
079
080  @Override
081  public final String toString() {
082    return this.getGenericComponentType().getTypeName() + "[]";
083
084  }
085  
086}
